definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The super-fine aluminium hydroxide is widely used due to its advantages.
sentences.chinese: 超細氫氧化鋁具有許多優點，應用廣泛。

sentences.english: Astham model was duplicated with ovalbumin (OVA) absorbed to aluminum hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用卵蛋白和氫氧化鋁複製哮喘模型。

sentences.english: Easy to absorb moisture and reacts with water into aluminium hydroxide and isopropanol.
sentences.chinese: 易吸溼，遇水分解成氫氧化鋁和異丙醇。

sentences.english: High whiteness aluminum hydroxide (AH) is finding increasing applications in filler market.
sentences.chinese: 高白氫氧化鋁在填料市場有着廣闊的應用。

sentences.english: On-Line measurement of solid content in aluminium hydroxide slurry by isotopic densitometer.
sentences.chinese: 應用同位素密度計在線測量氫氧化鋁料漿的固體含量。
